team.name: Aditya bangde
team.description: Researched and selected core components, assembled and integrated the system, and optimized amplifier settings. Worked on identifying noise sources and ensuring clean signal flow. Collaborated on 3D printing and hardware testing of the custom headset.

team.name: Rakshitha Babu
team.description: Tested and validated hardware functionality, fine-tuned signal pathways, and analyzed noise interference. Used DSO and multimeter to verify amplifier and ADC performance. Collaborated on 3D printing the custom headset and contributed to EEG data collection and signal testing.

team.name: Shreya Sarma
team.description: Led data cleaning and preprocessing, and trained the deep learning model through multiple iterations. Focused on improving classification accuracy with optimized training and validation.
